title: Mark Hughes: Zandvoort repeats McLaren duel from 40 years ago
summary: Piastri and Norris’s Dutch GP drama echoed McLaren’s past, 40 years on from Lauda and Prost’s fierce Zandvoort duel, asMark Hughesrecalls

qa_pairs.question: Which two McLaren drivers were involved in a notable duel during the 1980 Dutch Grand Prix?
What recent McLaren drivers were mentioned for their dramatic performance at the Dutch GP?
How many years apart were the duels at Zandvoort involving McLaren drivers when comparing the events from 1980 to the present?
